ABOUT THE SPEAKERS:   

Zachary Fleckner   

Massachusetts unrestricted construction supervisor

Repair, Renovate and Paint certified

Low and Moderate Lead removal

Robin Thompsons Junker to Millionaire Boot camp

Fortune builders Marketing and Rehab boot camps

Fortune builders Mastery and Inner circle members

 

Bob Frommer

Fortune builders Marketing and Rehab boot camps

Fortune builders Mastery and Inner circle members

Alan Cowgills private Lending

BA from Worcester Poly Tech

 

David Fleckner

Fortune builders Marketing and Rehab boot camps.

Alan Cowgills private Lending

Fortune builders Mastery and Inner circle members

Low and Moderate Lead Removal Certification

Massachusetts Real Estate License

Property Management Diploma from Allied schools

Jeff Taylors Landlord Boot Camp

Former Board member and current member of the Northern Worcester County Landlord Association

Retired USA Army

. 


MAIN TOPICS TO BE COVERED:

Location - Demgraphics and due dillagence

 

Purchase price - MAO or not

 

Rehab cost - holding or flipping

 

Exit strategies

 

Marketing - To sell or rent

  About ICW Development:

 

The speakers are partners in ICW Development, LLC and have been doing real estate investing since 2008. From August of 2008 to present have completed 21 buildings between flipping and holding and numerous rehabs for other investors. ICW Development has 3 parts of its company: property holding, construction, and property management. David is responsible for Property management, operations and sales, Bob is responsible for Acquisitions, Finance, Legal and Lender management, Zachary is responsible for Acquisitions, Project Management, Construction, maintenance and contractor relation.

 

 

 

 

Check our website for the updated speaker schedule. www.newenglandreia.com


The Best Western Hotel
187 Chelsmford St.

When: 1st Wednesday of Each Month

item.how_to_find_us: Walk into the front of the building, and straight ahead you will see our Welcome table.

item.name: To Buy and Hold, or Buy and Flip?
